thread.title: Coastal Alabama radio legend hoping for 'One Shining Moment' following final broadcast
thread.title_full: Coastal Alabama radio legend hoping for 'One Shining Moment' following final broadcast

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Coastal Alabama radio legend hoping for 'One Shining Moment' following final broadcast
text: Wayne Garder's last morning broadcast, following a 44-year career on coastal Alabama radio, will take place on Friday. Gardner is also a former South Carolina Gamecock, who played on the men's basketball team in the early 1970s. He calls the 2016 squad's march to its first Final Four as a welcomed "distraction" from the emotions of retirement.
